message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer is $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective on the value of the product. Our counteroffer is $850000 for the product.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.
Considering your feedback, Bob, we've decided to adjust our offer to $825000 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive.

I appreciate the revised offer, but I'm still a bit far from being comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $775000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

We've carefully considered your latest offer, Bob. In light of our discussions, we're proposing an offer of $812500 for the product. This price aims to meet both our needs and the perceived value of the product to you.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still not quite there. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.
After thoughtful consideration, we've decided to offer you $787500 for the product. We hope this proposal better aligns with the perceived value of the product to you.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $737500. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
